content: Windows Version & Build Analysis - Get exact version, insider status, feature updates
Security Configuration Analysis - Defender, firewall, BitLocker, TPM, secure boot
Update History & Status - Recent patches, pending updates, Windows Update config
System Integrity Check - SFC status, registry health, boot configuration
Services & Features Analysis - Critical services, optional features status
User Environment Analysis - Account types, groups, privileges
System Performance Analysis - Uptime, boot performance, responsiveness
Event Log Analysis - Critical errors, warnings, system events
